creator: michael.freeman@sabre-holdings.com
text:
Null pointer exception gets throwen while remote testing. Frequnecy increases 
with increasing amounts of servers. Did not experience bug in lower end servers 
so perhaps its timing related. A fix was added for the same problem in 
ClientJmeterEngine. The fix was applied to the same code in 
StandardJmeterEngine and the problem was resolved.

The code that was changed in ClientJmeterEngine was the following

getTestTree().traverse(sampleListeners);

which was protected by a try/catch block for IndexOutOfBounds.

There are several traverse calls in StandardJMeterEngine, but it's not obvious
which code in StandardJMeterEngine needs to be changed. Please could you say
more exactly what needs to be changed?

Meanwhilre reducing severity.
creator: sebb@apache.org
